subject: Automobiles
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Lewis Hamilton won the Japanese Grand Prix yesterday, using his pole position to avoid dangerous spray from rival cars in wet conditions. Hamilton, a McLaren driver, has a 12-point lead in the Formula One standings.
snippet: Lewis Hamilton won the Japanese Grand Prix yesterday, using his pole position to avoid dangerous spray from rival cars in wet conditions. Hamilton, a McLaren driver, has a 12-point lead in the Formula One standings.
